name: Pawng
description:
A Pong clone with a little bit of polish in ~1400 lines of C90 (not counting embedded assets and included libraries), written in a weekend.

I wrote this in as a "game dev kata", primarily to reassure myself that I can still code and have made improvements in the decade since I wrote my first C program.

The lovely soundtrack was made by my fiancee, Moody.

Controls

Move the left paddle using Up & Down, or W & S, or the left thumbstick of an XBox controller. Pause & resume with Enter / Escape / Start / Back. Toggle fullscreen with Alt+Enter.
